name: Strange Awakening
description:
You awaken in a strange new place, desperate to survive and escape.

This is a short visual novel with heavy focus on choices and 3 endings, made as part of SCREAM JAM 2020. I hope you enjoy playing!

WARNING: the in-browser game is laggy unfortunately, so downloaded versions may work better. The Linux and macOS files are untested and may not work as intended. Proceed with caution.
